name: BADCUBES DODGEBALL
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Click - Grab  and  throw

HOW TO PLAY

- Avoid the cubes

- Toss balls to kill them

- Spawn more balls with buttons on the walls

- Bounce the ball off floors and walls for more points

CREDITS

Developed by Josh Wade

Font from 1001fonts

Music from bensound

SFX from freesoundeffect

Created for the #stopwaitingforgodotgamejam on September 4th and 5th, 2021
